project_metadata.name: HingeCraft Global Notion Workspace
project_metadata.purpose: Complete project management, team collaboration, and data tracking workspace for HingeCraft Global initiatives
project_metadata.mission: Building resilient, abundant futures through accessible technology and sustainable design
project_metadata.vision: A world where every community has the tools, knowledge, and connections to create sustainable abundance locally

prompt_categories.purpose: Generate executive summary content for HingeCraft Global

prompts.title: Notion Dashboard Integration - Executive Summary - Variation 1 - Professional

Features donation processing, charter invitation system, and community engagement tools.. Status: Done (100%). Team: Engineering, Design, Community. Priority: High. Category: Platform. Use professional tone. Include specific details, examples, and actionable information. Variation focus: Community impact.

intended_purpose.primary_purpose: Comprehensive GPT prompt system with ~2000 sequences for generating all HingeCraft Global Notion workspace content with consistent voice, tone, and quality
use_cases: Automated content generation for all project documentation
Consistent brand voice across all Notion content
Scalable content creation for workspace expansion
Quality assurance for all written content

usage_instructions.how_to_use: Load this JSON file into GPT-powered scripts to generate comprehensive content for all HingeCraft Global Notion workspace elements
usage_instructions.execution_order: Prompts are numbered by sequence (1-2000) and should be executed in order for comprehensive content generation
usage_instructions.customization: Prompts can be customized with project-specific data before execution
usage_instructions.output_format: All prompts generate markdown-formatted content ready for Notion
usage_instructions.quality_assurance: All content should be reviewed for brand voice alignment and accuracy before publishing
